text: rrhosis - Clitoromegaly - Cystic angiomatosis of bone - Decreased serum leptin - Generalized muscular appearance from birth - Hepatic steatosis - Hepatomegaly - Hirsutism - Hyperinsulinemia - Hypertriglyceridemia - Insulin-resistant diabetes mellitus at puberty - Labial hypertrophy - Large hands - Lipodystrophy - Long foot - Mandibular prognathia - Nearly complete absence of metabolically active adipose tissue (subcutaneous, intraabdominal, intrathoracic) - Polycystic ovaries - Polyphagia - Prom
